actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to authorize the Senate Legal Council to represent the Judiciary Subcommittee on Administrative Practice and Procedure.

summary.text: Authorizes the Senate Legal Counsel to intervene in the name of the Subcommittee on Administrative Practice and Procedure (of the Committee on the Judiciary) in any legal proceeding commenced by the Department of Justice to determine the subcommittee's access to specified documents.

titles.title: A resolution to authorize the Senate Legal Council to represent the Judiciary Subcommittee on Administrative Practice and Procedure.
